title: Update: No Concussion for Primož Roglič After Nasty Crash at Itzulia Basque Country
content:
Doctors confirm 'superficial wounds on right side, contusions and bruising.' Bora-Hansgrohe rider Lennard Kämna injured in training incident in Tenerife.

Read the full article at Update: No Concussion for Primož Roglič After Nasty Crash at Itzulia Basque Country on Velo.
author: ahood
